title: Centara Grand & Bangkok Convention Centre at CentralWorld scoops Best Meetings & Conventions Hotels at TTG Travel Awards
text:
Centara Grand & Bangkok Convention Centre at CentralWorld scoops Best Meetings & Conventions Hotels at TTG Travel Awards Centara Grand & Bangkok Convention Centre at CentralWorld scoops Best Meetings & Conventions Hotels at TTG Travel Awards Details Category: Awards   13:30 As one Centara’s flagship properties, we are pleased to announce that Centara Grand & Bangkok Convention Centre have been awarded as the Best Meetings & Conventions Hotel by TTG Travel Awards 2015. The TTG Travel Awards are organised by TTG Asia, the region’s most authoritative travel industry publication, with voting open to all readers of TTG Asia, TTG China, TTG India, TTGmice, TTG-BTmice China, TTGassociations and TTG Asia Luxury. 
The 26th Annual TTG Travel Awards 2015 ceremony was held on October 1, 2015 at Centara Grand & Bangkok Convention Centre at CentralWorld. Kobkarn Wattanavrangkul, Minister of Tourism and Sports Ministry of Thailand presented the award to Thirayuth Chirathivat, Chief Executive Officer of Centara Hotels & Resorts. “The team at Centara Grand & Bangkok Convention Centre at CentralWorld continues to develop innovative approaches to meetings and conventions. As a hotel, convention centre and leisure destination, Centara Grand is able to provide a fully integrated experience for guests,” comments Thirayuth Chirathivat, Chief Executive Officer at Centara Hotels & Resorts. “Receiving recognition for our hard work by the readers of TTG Asia, an outstanding publication, we are encouraged to continue to strive and further develop opportunities.” Related articles
